divs: Sighting Detailsnoticed huge red light in sky, in northern sky . object remained stable for many minutes , then moved slowly south and stopped again for several minutes and then moved south -east and stopped again for several minutes and then moved more quickly south and stopped for 3or 4 minutes and then disappeared ?? got phone call from freind telling me to look in the sky!! whent out side and looked up to the northern sky and saw the object , it was huge , waited for it to do some thing , it stayed still for a few minutes and then moved as i described . I took photos and they came out good!!!! I have attached photo , I hope they get to you ! I will be glad to talk with someone about the siteing ! My girl freind was the one that called me and told mme to look out side , we watched it while on the phone together untill it disappeared! we both took photos , mine are with a delephoto lence and hers are with out .hope to hear from you!!!
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Salton City
